Let's see if I can break it down in terms even you can understand.
 
 If gays weren't demonized, bashed, killed and made to feel like aliens from another world, then they wouldn't feel so marginalized and criminalized, and have to resort to logical places of human contact....toilets. Men use toilets..their willies are easily accessible, and they might be hard up or on. It happens. 
 
 By inference you suggested that homos were the only ones who were being nuisances by publicly displaying affection. Obviously you're not bothered by straights doing the same. Perhaps you've done it yourself. And no doubt, feel privileged. 
 
 People don't have the right to do a lot of stuff that they do...but they do. 
 I have never seen gays picketing for the right to be lewd in bathrooms. Hookers don't have a right to hassle you or charge you up...but it's done. Stop being a wimp and/or a prude.

 
 If homosexuals are being brutilised why choose a place that they can be regularly found , trapped and brutilised further?

 Some homosexuals find this insulting.

 No I have never had sex in a public toilet.
 I did have a knee trembler behind the local supermarket but no one else was there and no one was inconvenienced...maybe this is the way forward for gays too.
